column1: Little Goat Diner////This is a milkshake. They have to do something about pork fat and then take it across the street where they turn it into gelato or something
column2: and then bring it back for the toffee. Ok
column4: this is disgusting. The description made me want to gag (I asked for the description after I ordered)
column5: and you taste vanilla smokey pork fat! EW! I had some people try it
column8: I had to just down it
column9: so I did. The toffee crunch was very good
column10: but the rest of the shake was disgusting! Never again!
